name: TRYON
description: Perfectly trains visual memory, because you have to try to remember the playing field and reach the finish in the shortest possible time.Is a logical game where you have to solve a lot of levels with various puzzles.Do not think that you can pass every level in first try and max score, it's not that easy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with 512Mb Storage: 750 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
